items.sentence: Why are you so worried about what might happen?
I should\'ve told Tom why he needed to do that.
I shouldn\'t have stayed up so late last night.
I slept on a cot in Tom\'s basement last night.
Tom spends most of his free time reading books.
If you\'ve been drinking, you shouldn\'t drive.
I didn\'t realize you were allergic to peanuts.
I didn\'t really understand what was happening.
I didn\'t see you at the party the other night.
I didn\'t think Tom would want to see me again.
Tom was angry because I didn\'t agree with him.
Tom tried to open the drawer, but it was stuck.
Tom used to hang out with Mary, John and Alice.
Tom usually eats lunch in the school cafeteria.
I guess Tom didn\'t want you to know the truth.
Tom ought to be allowed to go to Mary\'s party.
They can still accomplish their goals, I think.
I\'m amazed at Tom\'s rapid progress in French.
I don\'t think that Tom was through doing that.
I don\'t think that Tom would enjoy doing that.
